Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/15 2:10PM -  Afternoon Stratton! The sun is shining, and the snow was great to lay an edge in today. Its warming up over the next few days so you may or may not need that extra layer. On Tuesday, youll be taking turns down 61 trails. Alongside, 7 lifts are set to spin at 9AM with no delays detected. Our snowmaking repairs have been fixed, and our snowmakers will be out on the mountain tonight, lighting up BlackBear, Way Home, Big Ben, and Short Cut Big Ben!

We enjoyed having the Sun Bowl open for the weekend and offering some stellar powder skiing! Unfortunately, the Sun Bowl trails have minimal base and we feel it is best to close those trails for this coming week. The good news is that Black Bear is now open, knowing it can hold up to the lower weekday skier and rider traffic. 

Have a fantastic night, Stratton, well see ya on the mountain tomorrow! 

Safety Tip: Please slow down when entering the lift mazes. 

Want to go on an adventure of a lifetime? Well, you're in luck, our Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee your spot.

The Nordic Center is now open for Nordic Skiing and Snowshoeing! Enjoy the peaceful 10km of trails with friends or family.  

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
